definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
porphyrin (organic chemical essential to hemoglobin and chlorophyll) (loanword)

sentences.english: Oxacillin and cefazolin were added to control infection.
sentences.chinese: 術後還加用新型青黴素和頭孢唑啉，控制感染。

sentences.english: Several drugs may induce or exacerbate symptoms in acute porphyria.
sentences.chinese: 幾種藥物可能會誘發或加重症狀的急性卟啉症。

sentences.english: An analytical method of imidacloprid residue in vegetable soybean by high-performance liquid chromatography(HPLC) was developed.
sentences.chinese: 採用高效液相色譜法測定毛豆中吡蟲啉農藥殘留。

sentences.english: It is found in porphyrins, and is essential for chlorophyll synthesis.
sentences.chinese: 卟啉結構中具有鐵，是組成葉綠素的必要物質。

sentences.english: Imazamox is an imidazolinone compound. It is a high-effective post-emergence herbicide used in upland field.
sentences.chinese: 甲氧咪草煙爲咪唑啉酮類高效旱田苗後除草劑。

sentences.english: The only known hemoglobinopathy of animals is porphyria.
sentences.chinese: 動物中唯一已知的血紅蛋白病是卟啉症。

sentences.english: The numbers after HPD refer to the nominal diameter of the unit in millimeters.
sentences.chinese: 卟啉後的數字是指該單位名義在毫米直徑。

sentences.english: In addition, these ligands showed higher activity than thioether deveritives of phenyl oxazolines.
sentences.chinese: 而且和苯環衍生的硫噁唑啉相比反應活性相對較高。

sentences.english: The values of zinc protoporphyrin (ZPP) in the blood of 536 normal children are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文報告536例正常小兒全血鋅原卟啉的測定值。

sentences.english: Therapy with phentolamine produced a significant decrease in the preejection period index.
sentences.chinese: 用酚胺唑啉治療，能使噴射前期指數大大降低。

sentences.english: This is the porphyria, a rare genetic disease.
sentences.chinese: 這就是卟啉症了，一種罕見的遺傳疾病。

sentences.english: This review summarizes the recent progress in the research of fluoroporphyrins and its proper-ties.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了近幾年國內外含氟卟啉的合成及其研究進展。

sentences.english: This paper reviews the current status and future of the imidazolinone herbicide-resistant crops.
sentences.chinese: 本文詳述了咪唑啉酮抗性作物的現狀及其發展。

sentences.english: Add Ferroin indicator and titrate with 0.025 N ferrous ammonium sulphate solution.
sentences.chinese: 加入亞鐵菲繞啉離子，用滴定法測量硫酸亞鐵銨溶液。

sentences.english: ConclusionNAPP has a certain inhibitory effect on Hepatitis B virus in vitro and in vivo.
sentences.chinese: 結論原卟啉鈉體內外均具有明顯的抗乙肝病毒作用。

sentences.english: Objective To explore zinc protoporphyrin (ZPP) level and distribution in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究工業區兒童鋅卟啉水平及其分佈規律。

definition: used as phonetic bi- or pi-
